news_header: Vespa orientalis hornets can survive high ethanol consumption without adverse effects.
news_text: Research shows that Vespa orientalis hornets can consume an 80% ethanol solution for weeks without negative effects on their lifespan or nest-building abilities. Unlike other animals, they metabolize alcohol efficiently, possibly due to gut yeasts. This discovery highlights the hornets' unique tolerance to alcohol and raises questions about their social behavior and interactions under the influence.
